definitions.definition: The tenderest part of a loin of meat , especially of pork or beef .
A district of a city where corruption is common, often because the district is devoted to questionable businesses ( peep shows , etc) which are easy for police to blackmail and extort .

main_definition: The tenderest part of a loin of meat , especially of pork or beef .
secondary_definitions: ( dated , US slang ) A district of a city where corruption is common, often because the district is devoted to questionable businesses ( peep shows , etc) which are easy for police to blackmail and extort .
